talents.description: You can input up to 4 copies of each Mantra ingredient instead of being limited to 3.
You regenerate health faster than normal when sprinting below 75% HP.
Incoming PEN is reduced by 40%.
Dodging a move will briefly make you invisible or until you attack.
Flourishing enemies that are charmed by you causes them to not be knocked back and be dazed instead.
You refuse. You cannot be knocked off your feet until you are knocked completely unconscious. You are also now knocked down for less time.
Any time you would burn to death, you instead rise again with 50% of your health restored. Has a 60 second cooldown.
Gain 5% extra PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
All of your wind attacks apply 'Suffocate'.
Assassinating an enemy automatically assassinates other nearby enemies.
Take unequipped equipment when mugging a player.
Once you've brought down your prey, instill fear into all those who would seperate you from claiming it. 40s cooldown.
Once per hour, command a servant to defy all odds and obey your command - live.
Your speed boost from killing is increased and duration is doubled, but will only work on players.
You easily brush off shorter falls, taking no fall damage.
Your first wall jump will always send you higher than normal. Gain a speed boost after jumping over a wall.
Taking a life grants a speed boost for 5 seconds.
You're much more resistant to being pushed around. Ice no longer affect your movement.
Knocking a player tags them with a wind trap, cause anyone to pick up that body to get sent flying. However, if you pick up the body you gain the speed boost for 20 seconds.
Your trap automatically detonates on contact with an object.
Enemies hit by your wind mantra are winded, having their attack speed lowered for a short duration.
Your suffocates last twice as long.
When flourishing enemies into walls they are suffocated and winded for a short duration.
Your gale punch pulls enemies in before you hit them.
Potions you prepare will have amplified positive effects when consumed.
Potions you create will have amplified negative effects when thrown.
Potions you prepare will have a seperate chance for each individual effect to be magnified in strength.
You no longer drop Potions on death.
You now gain +1% Mantra PEN for every 10 point of Intelligence.
Even when things look dire, you still have it in you to keep your legs moving.
When enemies initiate a fight first, you gain a speed boost.
An application of Pleeksty's concept of the inner flame, also known as the soul of man. Set yourself ablaze to gain extra Strength and Speed.
Gain the ability to incinerate yourself when down.
Fish are drawn to your line more quickly.
Once something's caught your line, it's much harder to get loose.
Casting your line excites ocean life, reducing the chances of fishing up trash.
Regain ether, tempo, blood, and health from killing.
Enemies you hit in the water or the depths have their speed buffs nullified and are slowed.
Gain extra Ether for every Mantra in your arsenal.
Your skills alone substitute the need for a Craft Station.
You suffer much less speed decrease from crouching.
Your stealth when crouching is increased. You pull your weapon out silently.
talents.from: Also obtained through several different outfits

talents.description: Assassinating someone gives you 50% PEN for 5 seconds.
Those you carry are blindfolded.
Your attacks against ragdolled enemies no longer deal reduced damage.
You can throw things further.
You swim faster in water.
You receive less posture damage and deal more posture damage when under attack by multiple enemies.
All moves that apply electricity slow the opponent more.
Electrified attacks do 50% less posture damage to you.
Lightning moves now have a chance to apply "Electrify". Attacks from Electrified opponents are converted to Lightning damage, but will deal 10% less damage to you.
Attacks from opponents who are Electrified will give you Ether proportional to their initial damage.
Opponents who are electrified do 50% less damage to you.
You can breathe more easily with +20% faster posture regen.
After being block broken, the next attack to hit you deals reduced damage.
All slow debuffs towards you are cut in half.
Blocking no longer slows you down as much.
When knocked down, you get back up again more quickly.
Deal more damage to larger foes.
talents.from: Complete Starswept Valley Monster Hunter Quest

talents.description: Switching your Fist Style mid-fight makes your basic Fist attacks inflict bleed temporarily.
[Greataxes] Attacking an enemy slowed by your Greataxe grants you temporary hyperarmor 20 second cooldown.

[Greataxes] Basic attacks will slightly slow your enemy for 2 seconds. Running attacks will slightly slow your enemy for 3 seconds. Attacking an enemy that has speed boosts increases posture damage against them.
Move faster after successfully dodging an attack.
You deal +10% more damage to those with higher HP than you.
Charm enemies nearby when attacked at low health. Enemies affected by this charm have their damage increased to anyone but you, and deal reduce damage towards you.
Landing mantras on enemies charms them reducing damage done to you.
Enemies charmed by your mantras are charmed longer.
Allies recover twice as fast from being knocked when charmed by you.
Deal more damage to enemies charmed by you. Being hit by someone of the same race or oath causes them to be charmed for a short duration.
Jumping while sliding down a slope or off a cliff launches you forward.
Enemies receive less posture back when they parry your attacks.
[Heavy Weapons] Your M1 posture damage is increased by 25%.
Dodging an attack increases your Knife's Journey critical chance by 30%.
When flourishing an enemy, they leave behind a trail of ice in the direction you send them.
Passively collect condensation from the air, greatly reducing your thirst.
If set on fire while on ice, immediately put it out and enter a state of chill. During this state you cannot be lit on fire.
Press [F] during the wind up of your Ice Spikes to create traps around you instead of spawning a spike in the normal spot.
When block broken, fragile freeze yourself, negating the damage of the next attack.
Your ice Mantras will freeze opponents upon blockbreaking them.
When in Cryostasis inflict frost damage to the enemy who hit you.
Assassination damage now scales with level. Assassination now gives you a temporary speed boost.
Gain a speed boost after causing an opponent heavy blood loss.
Assassinating a target with a dagger applies anti-heal for 20 seconds.
Assassinations now leave enemies on the ground longer.
Your dodge window is slightly increased.
Grip players faster whenever you have a speed boost active.
You can assassinate those with weapons out provided you're not in combat yourself.
If a shadowcast mantra would drain your opponent's Ether to 0, drain from their Tempo instead and increase your Tempo.
Your Shadowcast Mantras deal more damage at night.
Engulf your enemy in shadows when flourishing them.
Knocking out an enemy in combat restores a portion of your ether.
Stealing enough ether to fill your bar now stores the extras in your Tempo.
If multiple enemies are hit by your Shadow Eruption, they are dazed.
Extra ether stolen with mantras are exerted as dark energy, damaging and absorbing ether from those nearby.
Your singularity now pulls ether from the extra players affected.
Your interaction with The Depths allows you to easily draw Ether from the surrounding air.
You now will shout the names of your mantras upon cast.
talents.from: Pay 50 Notes to the Spell Shout NPC in Isle of Vigils

talents.description: You can hear it pounding in your head. The sound beneath the waves. Will you respond?
Enemies you knocked remain down longer than usual.
Parrying opponents gives you 25% more posture back.
Deal +10% more damage when your health is significantly low.
After landing a critical your next light attack will chip past your opponent's block.
You dance from toe to toe - successful dodges restore posture.
[Medium Weapons] When above half health and two-handing, posture damage taken is reduced.
Your blinding light now concusses foes.
Deal less damage to comrades and receive less damage from comrades
You now slow Taunted enemies when you hit them.
You hold onto more items when defeated.
Receive Ether back when inflicted with damage from Mantras.
Your Ether adept talents that gran you Ether on proc now give you stacks of Inspiration. At 3 stacks of Inspiration, your mantras will deal 10% more damage for 3s.
Being under an elemental status effect causes your physical attacks to do more damage.
Draw your foes ether into your weapon when you parry ether-based attacks.
Being hit increases ether regen for a short duration.
Knocking an enemy with a mantra refunds the cost of the mantra.
Deal more damage to enemies with status effects on them with your basic attacks, but the effect is removed upon impact.
Aerial moves will follow up into a devastating slam.
If you Meteor Slam an opponent whilst on fire, restore some HP and Ether.
Taking damage while using Flame Repulsion reflects the damage back to the attacker.
Being hit by lightning will cause you to momentarily disappear.
Ignite flames on an enemy when you uppercut them.
Fire mantras now move you in the direction you're facing.
Blood Loss from all sources are reduced.
When Warding Radiance is active you leave trails of flame when you slide.
After landing a flame dagger on an opponent, your next hit against them will impale with a divine spear from above.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your flamecharm to its fullest.
Grants you the ability to command Fire as a Flamecharmer.
You can now obtain 1-star Flamecharmer Mantras.
You can now obtain 2-star Flamecharmer Mantras.
You can now obtain 3-star Flamecharmer Mantras.
Many of your flames turn blue, signifying their increased intensity.
Flames wear off twice as fast on you.
A simple production of Flame for the use of making Campfires.
Your flames burn just as strong even in the fiercest of storms.
Pressing [F] before releasing your Flame Impact will release a wider but shorter flame.
Your fire mantras now detonate any stacked crystals.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your agility to its fullest.
talents.from: Talk to the Windrunner at Etris Wilds

talents.description: You have a 25% chance to not deplete potions when drinking them.
Press [F] while using your Ice Smash Mantra to follow up with a devastating attack.
Cast while sliding to perform a running attack with your ice sabers.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your frostdraw to its fullest.
Grants you the ability to command Ice as a Frostdrawer.
You can now obtain 1-Star Leveled Frostdrawer Mantras.
You can now obtain 2-Star Leveled Frostdrawer Mantras.
You can now obtain 3-Star Leveled Frostdrawer Mantras.
Your Vent is imbued with glacial frost.
Your frost is now considerably more intense.
Sliding while Orbital Ice is active leaves trails of ice.

When landing a parry while standing on ice, automatically forms a ring of gravitational ring of ice that absorbs 25% of the physical damage you take. The ring break after sustaining a certain amount of damage.
Cast Wind Blade while sliding to unleash a quick whirlwind attack.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your galebreathe to its fullest.
Grants you the ability to command Wind as a Galebreather
You can now obtain 1-Star Leveled Galebreather Mantras
You can now obtain 2-Star Leveled Galebreather Mantras
You can now obtain 3-Star Leveled Galebreather Mantras
Pressing [F] after hitting an opponent with Wind Rising will cause your follow up kick to impale them to the ground.
Glide straight with the power of Gales
If an attack is physical and wind, it will apply an after cut that does 5% of the damage you dealt. If the attack was a mantra, it does 5% damage instead.
Knocking enemies into objects with wind spells deals additional blunt damage based on how hard they're hit.

Cancelling a wind spell stores its power in your lungs for 5 seconds, empowering the next wind spell cast in that time. All relevant modifications and upgrades from the inhaled wind mantra are applied to the empowered mantra.
When breaking someone's posture detonate any active crystals on their body.
Your ice abilities no longer grant a slow effect or the ability to freeze and instead cause ice crystals to grow on your opponent.
Your weapon gives you ether back.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your fortitude to its fullest.
talents.from: Talk to Brutus in Fort Merit

talents.description: Allows you to fire your offhand gun right after swinging. [Not necessary on dual guns]
Your stored Wind mantras can now empower your Fire mantras.
Hitting chilled enemies with shurikens while they are on ice freezes them to the ground.
All ice spells casted on top of ice cost less Ether.
Enemies can no longer heal when under the effect of your chill.
Greatsword and Greathammer criticals now place Ice underneath the path they carve.
You forge more shurikens when casting on ice.
You can parry unparryable attacks from giant monsters, at the cost of a significant amount of armor durability.
Fire spells cost 70% less while on fire. If you hit someone while on fire, apply fire damage.
Self-inflicted fire damage is reduced.
If you hit an opponent that you've lit on fire, it spreads to anyone nearby. Including yourself.
Your flames will incinerate unconscious Targets much faster.
Bodies that you burn to death immediately explode dealing massive damage.
You gain some Ether from consuming elemental ingredients.
When on fire, automatically quench flames at the cost of some ether.
You have a layer of Natural Armor that replenishes when you rest
The secrets of the Deep are easier for you to unravel. Your mind is sturdier against its effects
As a show of independance when they come of age, Tirans will strike out on their own with just their hand-crafted glider, gliding down from the mountains peaks where they make their homes.
Buffs the sanity of one person they choose around them as long as they are at a campfire
Buffs the rest of one person they choose around them as long as they are at a campfire
Buffs the food of one person they choose around them as long as they are at a campfire
Being attacked causes you to release Mothwing Dust, granting you vision of your attacker, not to be confused with the band name.
Your bond with your allies is strong enough to reduce damage between you
Your understanding of your destiny is such that learning new things often comes naturally to you. People appreciate your diplomatic ways of speaking
Ailments and blessings alike fade away more quickly
Navae's star guides your path, showing you the way forward. You are less prone to starvation
Relying on your instincts, you are naturally more stealthy. You are more nimble on wooden surfaces
You have a keen understanding of ships and their maintenance.
You learn how to use new pieces of equipment quicker than others. You can equip things at 3 points lower than the requirement
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your willpower to its fullest.
talents.from: Speak to Akira in Castle Light

talents.description: Your Jus Karita attacks deal 25% more damage.
Hitting a Jus Karita critical attack while Swiftkick Prodigy is active will greatly slow your enemy and consume your speed boost.
Jus Karita does bonus posture damage against other Fist styles.
Hitting an opponent with your Jus Karita critical resets the cooldown. Cooldown of 10 seconds
Gain the ability to use fist combat against weapons. Including the ability to block weapons with your heands using Ether.
talents.from: Speak to Polis in Etris with the requirements

talents.description: Hitting successive basic attacks with Jus Karita will give you a temporary speed buff.
[Spears] Damage dealt with the tip of the spear is increased by 10%.
[Spears] Posture breaking an opponent grants you +50% Penetration for 3 seconds.
[Spears] The first hit of your Spear's Critical Attack will deal the posture damage of the second hit as well. The second hit no longer deals posture damage.
[Spears] Hitting an enemy after a perfect dodge makes your next attack deal bleed damage.
Your fire abilities no longer proc burn and instead proc on eruption under the enemies feet.
Upon being guard broken, you erupt. 30s cooldownn.
Your next Eruption after landing a critical is empowered with increased range and damage. 10s cooldown.
Block-breaking an enemy with a fire mantra applies Burning.
You can mark objects or enemies by pressing Z, which will mark them for all nearby allies.
Dodging an attack or hitting an enemy's block will transform your next dash into a Gale Dash.
After a successful Gale Dash you wrap your weapon in wind essence causing your next Light attack to do bleed damage and chip through your opponents block.
Posture damage is reduced when wielding a spear and holding still.
Breaking an enemy's posture will cause them take intense wind pressure damage and be flung backwards.
talents.from: Air Pressure, Not additive / either 30 Agility OR 30 Strength

talents.description: Create a step of wind below you when jumping in the air.
After saving a player from being gripped gain a short speed boost for a short duration.
When waking up from being knocked you are unable to be knocked down for 5 seconds. 120 second cooldown
Slow the enemy trying to execute you down with one last shout of your determination
When below 15% health your mantras require no ether to cast for 3 seconds 30 second cooldown
When hit 3 or more times within 3 seconds go into an uproar where you cannot be stunned for a short duration.
A blocked attack after a failed parry will cause the attack to deal half posture.
Hitting opponents on the ground lowers their blood.
You keep a well-stocked set of tools on your person at all times. Your flint never runs out of uses.
Your sanity recovers more quickly once out of terrifying situations.
Killing the beings of the deep replenishes your sanity somewhat.
You're resistant to the effects of Illusion magic. You are resistant to charms and tricks.
It's extra Ether, do you need anything else?
It's extra Health, do you need anything else?
Using a M1/Critical Attack on an enemy while losing sanity causes them to lose sanity.
Your non-basic attacks have 25% PEN.
You lose 15% less armor when hit.
Hitting an enemies block causes their parry window to be lowered for a short duration.
Knocking an enemy gives you 20% defense for 15 seconds.
Your hunger and thirst gain from eating increased.
Slightly increases posture.
Enemies who carry you move significantly slower.
Move faster when your armor runs out of durability.
Enemies gain less health and posture when they knock you.
Recover 15% of your max health after getting up from being knocked.
The first Mantra you get struck by while out of combat deals half of its damage.
Gain more health and posture when knocking enemies.
Your vision is obscured by something. Somehow, you feel safer. You remember the warmth of your youth.
While 2-handling, you take less posture damage.
Knocking an enemy resets your resonance cooldowns. This effect has a 60 second cooldown.
Your climb height increases when you slide jump.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your charisma to its fullest.
Amplify your shout into a scream using Ardour, dominating weaker foes. Hold H and release
When using Rhythm, you can hear the subtle heartbeats of all living things nearby.
An application of the Song that enables one to channel the Murmur into raw strength. Press H.
An application of the Song that enables the user to perceive the subtle Murmur emanating from all things. Press G while crouched.
talents.from: Complete the Harmonium Quest in the Ethironal Shrine Sanctuary

talents.description: An application of the Song that enables the user to suppress their own murmur. Press T while crouched.
You take 5% less damage when your armor is broken.
You take an additional 5% less damage when your armor is broken.
Moving while with a shield no longer slows you down.
talents.from: Equipped: Fists, Trained Fist Talent, Moving Fortress

talents.description: You do 2 more fist M1s before Flourishing.
Your Way of Navae fist style has 25% armor PEN.
Extend the speedboost off parrying.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your intelligence to its fullest.
Predicting an attack will briefly allow you to predict another.
Landing Prediction will halve the cooldown to a minimum of 2s. Whiffing will double the cooldown to a maximum of 30s. This effect stacks up for up to 30 seconds.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your strength to its fullest.
Resist the effects of some Weather Effects.
You gain +3% PEN per each person Charmed. Capping at +15% PEN.
Crimes you commit in allied territories are often ignored. Who's asking?
The negative reputation threshold for a faction to put up on bounty posters is now higher.
If you're attacked in an allied territory, your allies will come rushing to your aid.
Your reputation caps out higher.
Bodies affected by corpse explosion will lift into the air and track onto an enemy.
When you have no Ether, consume Stomach and Water to instantly cast your next fire mantra.
Blunt damage now deals full posture damage to shields.
You can collect lumber from the trees you fell with your fists. It's only natural.
Getting parried punishes your posture 50% less.
Your lightning attacks in water strike others near them with lightning.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Heavy Weapons attribute to its fullest.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Light Weapons attribute to its fullest.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Medium Weapons attribute to its fullest.
Using a mantra after an uppercut reduces its cost.
Using Static Withdraw when not being carried shocks yourself increasing your ability to scale walls, speed and applies shock to all outgoing physical damage and damage taken.
Your Jumpstart no longer gives you movement buffs, but your outgoing physical damage is increased. The self damage to activate it is lowered, along with your cooldown on Jumpstart.
When being carried use this talent to shock your captor, forcing them to drop you.
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your shadowcast to its fullest.
Harnesss the power of Shadow in your mantra crafting.
You can now obtain 1-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.
You can now obtain 2-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.
You can now obtain 3-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.
Block breaking an opponent obscures their vision with darkness more potent than your Shadow mantra.
Ether drained during Shadow Roar increases the size of it.
Enemies will briefly hang in place when they run from you.
Shadow lasts longer on your opponent.
The more a person is affected by your shadowcast the more you obscure their vision.
Enemies will briefly hang in place when hit by a shadow move.
When using a shield, you ready your block more quickly after taking a hit.
If your shield is on your back, take reduced backstab damage and negate Spine Cutter.
Your repairs are more efficient when the ship is on low health.
You always keep a couple spare. Your repairs are more efficient.
Deliver a one-liner on uppercuts, flourishes, and critical attacks that charms your opponents briefly.
Meleeing a 'Suffocated' opponent will grant you a speed boost.
Your connections often let you off the hook when you're in trouble with the law. Nepotism sure does pay!
Okay, the amount you're charging people for your items is getting downright criminal. But I'm just a talent description, I can't stop you.
Your Sing will now stir your allies into a frenzy, causing them to become Overcharmed for 15s, applying Charmed to enemies they hit with basic attacks.
Using Discovery of Fire will light nearby downed enemies aflame.
Getting knocked with an active tether allows you to steal health from tethered targets and not get knocked.
While you have active tethers your lightning mantras cost less ether.
Using stream core with an active tether link targets your closest active link.
Having two active tethers will cause the previous tethered enemy to get magnetized to your newest tethered enemy, also increases the duration of tethers by 15 seconds.
Flourishing an enemy creates a static link between you and your enemy. Your lightning stuns enemies for 1.5x as long.
Landing an uppercut adds a static link to your opponent.
Shadow moves will also steal Ether from those you are Static Linked tethered to.
While you have a Static Link on someone, your Wind mantras that hit them are imbued with flashes of Lightning.
Call forth the fury of storms by pressing F at the end of your move.
Damage taken from insanity is reduced.
You no longer shiver or panic when your sanity is at stake.
Your bullets ricochet to a nearby enemy when hitting an opponent.
You gain more nutrition from eating plants.
You have resistance against being poisoned by foods.
You can eat things most would consider inedible.
talents.miscellaneous: Must be unlocked through wiping with Iron Gut

talents.description: The max quantity of carrying food has increased.
You can now assassinate enemies from much farther range, shadestepping to their location if they're too far.
You can now shadestep to pick up knocked humanoids far away from you.
If you land your Revenge, clear the cooldown immediately 25s cooldown.
Hitting your opponent during a feint will cause them to be dazed.
Parrying an opponent then hitting someone else makes your next Mantra free.
Blocking or parrying a vent will absorb the Tempo cost of the vent. A Tactician steadies the course of battle.
Venting will shift any elemental status effects affecting you onto those hit by your vent.
Your Agitating Spark no longer spreads to your allies.
The food you cook now becomes Artisan food, increasing it's hunger and thirst gained by +25%.
Buffs applied by food you cook now have their buffs amplified by +30%.
If an enemy is on fire when you flourish, blast them away with a fire blast.
Set enemies on fire when you flourish them.
Absorb fire produced by you, once you reach 5 stacks your next attack will be an automatic explosive finish flourish.
Most enemies will hesitate a moment longer before executing you.
Pressing [R] while crouching allows you to fake being dead it's cancelled when hit or when toggling [R] again.
Gain more notes when mugging a player.
Gain the ability to pickpocket by pressing "N" on a downed person.
[Light Weapons] On 5th successful attack you will discharge static dealing lightning damage to those nearby.
After landing a lightning kick, press [F] to followup on your opponent with a less potent kick.
Every 3 perfect casted lightning mantra builds a stack at 3 stacks your next lightning mantra is instant cast.
After successfully casting lightning impact, strike down countless thunder at those below. In return your Lightning Impact will require more time to cast.
[Medium Weapons] Reaching 10 Static Blade charges will now consume the stacks and apply a lightning buff to your blade. 60 second cooldown.
talents.miscellaneous: Not additive / either 25 Strength OR 25 Agility

talents.description: [Medium Weapons] Reaching 10 Static Blade charges will now consume the stacks and apply a lightning buff to your blade. 60 second cooldown.
talents.miscellaneous: Not additive / either 25 Strength OR 25 Agility

talents.description: Your next dash after activating Static Blade is enhanced by lightning.
[Medium Weapons] Hitting blocks, blocking or parrying hits will now generate an electric charge in your blade, granting a small speed buff. Charges can stack up to 10 times.
Grants you the ability to command Lightning as a Thundercaller.
You can now obtain 1-star Thundercaller mantras.
You can now obtain 2-star Thundercaller mantras.
You can now obtain 3-star Thundercaller mantras.
Bodies of knocked enemies will be charged with electricity which will stun people who attempt to carry them.
Flints and Flamecharm are for simpletons.
Play the resurrector. Use your lightning to defibrillate your allies on the battlefield.
Following a flourish up with a lightning beam causes it to be casted instantly.
When using lightning clones you disappear leaving behind a static clone for a short duration.
Your lightning deals more damage when in the rain.
Reduces the time you spend stunned after being block broken.
Your allies and yourself execute faster while affected by Overcharm.
Standing close to your graceful flame will slowly restore sanity for others in the area.
When applying a potion effect to someone who already has one, the new effect is amplified.
Inhaling a spell will cause the wind to be applied to your melee attack.
Landing a hit with your critical makes your opponent unable to jump for a duration. Also slows your opponent.
Landing a hit removes your roll cooldown.
Increases Katana damage.
talents.from: Vigil Initiate or Cloak of Winds Outfit

talents.description: Running attacks do extra damage when you have a speed boost.
When hit below half health briefly disappear leaving behind an illusion clone to keep your opponent occupied.
While in the Illusionary Realm, press X to leave early. This will cost 10% of your current HP and leave the victim with monsters from The Depths for the remaining duration.
Command your servants to fight for their master, granting them enhanced stats for a duration.
Command your servant to run with all their might.
The Vow of Mastery grants the Master the power to command their Subject. To initiate a vow you must ask the other player if they'd like to make the vow.
You lose less hunger and thirst while swimming.
[Greatswords/Greathammers] Successfully dodging will give you hyperarmour on your next swing.
[Daggers] Instantly execute enemies finished with the critical attack of your dagger.
When you flourish an enemy much weaker than you, you kill them instantly.
When you flourish an enemy much weaker than you, you kill them instantly.
When you flourish an enemy much weaker than you, you kill them instantly.
Deal +20% more damage to human enemies with hyperarmor.
[Heavy Weapons] You can now wield heavy weapons one handed.
[Dagger] When you successfully flourish an enemy, you throw out a dagger afterwards.
Reduces incoming damage if hit during the heavy swing hyper armor.
Every 3 hits landed by perfectly casted Galebreathe mantras will cause the target to be quickly struck by a phantom of wind.
When hit with an element, take reduced damage from said element, but take more damage from any other element.
talents.miscellaneous: Locks Out: Return to the Dark Ages

talents.description: Having full Ether for 1.5 seconds or more grants an aura to your attacks that grants them 15% more damage.
Having full health causes your mantras do 1.25x damage.
You deal 10% more damage while airborne.
When falling from a high place, hold spacebar to generate wind currents until you hit the floor.
Enemies who jump while suffocated by you are dazed.
Drinking potions near allies has a chance to inflict the potion’s effect upon them.
As a skilled apothecarian, you are more accustomed to potions and gain greater benefits from ingesting potions that affect your regeneration.
As a skilled apothecarian, you are more accustomed to potions and gain greater benefits from ingesting potions that affect your regeneration.
In return for losing the ability to eat vegetation, sate your hunger by gripping monsters and people alike.
[Greataxes] Hitting an enemy slowed by your Greataxe temporarily reduces how far they can roll.
[Greataxes] Block breaking an enemy applies knockdown.
Your speed boost granted from dodging is increased.
When you successfully dodge, you'll automatically dodge the next attack.
Flourishing an opponent grants you 1.5x posture damage for 10 seconds.
Status effects are half as effective when you are below 35% HP.
[Greatsword] You deal additional posture damage when you parry enemies.
Everyone you Reinforce is drained of their HP for 20s.
Everyone you buff heals them slightly.
Everyone you buff with reinforce heals you by 1%.
You now have 10% chance to do 1.2x damage with daggers.
Your crits now deal 2x damage to armor.
Your critical strikes can now crit.
Enemies hit during the last moments of your ice beam are frozen.
Enter a rifted state when you sucessfully dodge, where you can't be damaged until its duration ends. Can be cancelled with feinting or attacking.
Your singularity pulls everyone nearby in.
Enemies you flourish into walls have their vision altered for a short duration and are dazed longer than usual.
Hitting an enemy in the back after a roll cancel will initiate a second slash.
The duration you are dazed from wall bangs is cut in half.
Roll again immediately after a roll cancel.
Receive Ether back on every successful perfect cast.
When swimming, you'll heal faster, but burn through your stomach more quickly.
Your dancing steps now gives a faster speed boost.
Landing fire mantras will restore your Tempo.
Landing a fire mantra immediately after flourishing an opponent will cause them to explode.
talents.miscellaneous: Locks Out: Eruption Path: Lava Serpent

talents.description: Every fire mantra builds up one halo stack. At 3 stacks a halo appears that allows you to slide further. Hell's Partisan is also triggered passively while this is active.
You have a layer of fortified Natural Armor that replenishes when you rest. Your Natural Armor will resist 10% of Physical Damage while active.
You're accustomed to drinking toxic fluids quickly. You'll get along famously with the other patrons at the tavern. Drinking potions slows you down less.
You take 10% less damage when below 30% health.
Your slow effect prevents opponents from rolling.
Pressing F during Champion's Whirlthrow will toss your opponent straight down.
Your mind is a pliable, flexible substance. The Ether cost of additional modifications on your Mantra is now reduced by 20%.
talents.from: Not additive / either 35 Intelligence, 35 Willpower, OR 35 Charsima

talents.description: Your bullets now ignore 25% of an opponent's blunt armor.
talents.from: Summer Isle Inn Quest; Summer Company Outfit

talents.description: Using Ether Bullets applies elemental damage of your highest investment.
Using Ether Bullets applies elemental damage of your highest investment.
Your M1s now apply anti-heal for 8s.
Your glare now ignores if your opponent is facing you.
Hitting an opponent with your Ice Daggers causes them to freeze.
You are no longer required to be over water to use Ice Skate.
When a chilled enemy receives a heal it's then redirected to you instead. While this is active and they are on ice, your rate of healing is doubled.
Your ice spear now lodges into human opponents and explodes.
Press [F] during the windup of Grand Javelin to activate. Your Grand Javelin now carries opponents through the air.,
Dodge frames are larger if you cancel your roll immediately.
Your dodge frames are increased by 25%.
Enemies hit after you feint them with your fist suffer slight bleed and have their vision obscured slightly.
Deal more damage the more insane you are.
When your sanity is at stake gain +20% PEN on your attacks.
Hitting your opponent causes them to slow down while holding S.
All of your attacks have 10% more PEN.
Stop moving for 15 seconds in order to initiate healing.
Mobs have a much higher chance to drop their rarest loot when slain.
Getting hit while knocked no longer resets your time knocked.
Your mantra damage is cut by 20%, but your incoming mantra damage is cut by 20% too.
Every 6 Light Hits builds of a Shield of Endurance reducing incoming damage by 15%.
talents.from: Equipped: Fists , Locked By: Orbital Ice

talents.description: Feinting gives a brief auto-parry window.
Your prediction now ignores the range requirement to reflect attacks.
Enemies you flourish into a wall has a chance of breaking the wall and are guard broken on impact.
Teleport to a location in exchange for Ether cost. Certain ranges will require a health sacrifice. Be careful as this technique can prove lethal to the user.
Meleeing a 'Suffocated' opponent will extend the duration of the Suffocation.
Typing gives a random buff to you and those around you.
Your Sing now stun opponents who are already charmed.
You regain some Armor upon killing enemies.
Daze swinging opponents when hitting them with an M1 with a heavy weapon.
Your mirage clones now explode.
Successfully dodging leaves a heat mirage clone that sets enemies that swung at you on fire.
Roll cancelling immediately after a parry will cause you to teleport behind your opponent.
Your attacks gain 10% PEN when you have an active speedboost.
Executing an enemy applies Overcharm to nearby allies and yourself.
You now emit a delayed burst of flames after coming close to death.
Your flame can be casted in the depths.
Your attacks now inflict bleed while you have a speed boost. 1s cooldown.
Briefly disappear after knocking an enemy.
Command your servant to obey your vow and return to your side.
Sacrifice the health of a servant in order to restore your own.
Landing an M1 puts target resonance on cooldown for a short duration.
You won't always drown to death when downed in water.
When an enemy would roll through one of your physical attacks, stomp the ground, dazing anyone nearby. Removes speed buffs from target upon landing.
Landing any physical mantra or critical places a hidden tendril on the opponent.
Pulls together any two opponents you've attached Hidden Tendrils to.
Dealing damage with Dawnwalker mantras briefly makes you immune to all elemental status effects for a short duration.
The grasp of shadow is meaningless in the face of your blinding light. Your Dawnwalker mantras are empowered after being hit by Shadowcast.
When damaged below 50% health, gain maximum sprint momentum temporarily, then this ability is put on cooldown.
Allows you to gain momentum much quicker while running.
Dashing at maximum sprint momentum makes you one with the wind itself.
While wallboosting, hold space and at the end of the wallboost, and you will be boosted further upwards.
Running attacks at maximum sprint momentum make you one with the winds, giving reduced endlag and more control.
The world is broken, linked by fragile webs. Traverse the path by stating your destination amidst the flame.

You vow to reject the Words of the Song, denying yourself of mantras in pursuit of your own path to true strength, no matter the cost. +15% damage on your weapon and +10% damage resistance to all Mantras.
talents.miscellaneous: Note: You may only have one Oath

talents.description: Venting makes you invisible briefly while boosting your speed.
You can now execute enemies much faster.
Your uppercut transforms into a teleport slash attack when you have Dread stacks, before going on a short cooldown.
Parrying mantras now silences your enemy temporarily, disabling their ability to cast further mantras.
Parrying, landing criticals, and flourishes now give you stacks of Dread, Each stack increases your mantra resistance, but you lose a stack if you get hit by a mantra.
You can now do a ground slash while sliding, applying a temporary speed debuff and preventing jumping to enemies hit.
You vow to be a shield for your comrades, to wear your regalia with pride and serve the greater collective. From each according to their ability, to each according to their needs.
talents.miscellaneous: Note: You may only have one Oath

talents.description: When Arc Suit is active, your dashes become Jet dashes allowing you to attack while dashing.
When blockbroken with the Arc Suit active, eject from the armor.
Blocking with your Arc Suit active negates all backstabs and allows you to block attacks from behind.
Holding Spacebar after double jumping prpels you up for a short duration.
When your Arc suit is active, outgoing and incoming enchant effects are nullified.
You vow to not let the horrors of the world pierce your tightly fastened blindfold. Everything is simply as we choose to perceive it.
talents.miscellaneous: Note: You may only have one Oath

talents.description: Your heart is forever now eternally tied to Zi'eer, the 4th Prophet of the Ministry. You swear to serve under his will, no matter the cost.
talents.miscellaneous: Note: You may only have one Oath

talents.description: You vow to forever reach towards the brilliant Light. There is no shadow that your radiance cannot expunge.
talents.miscellaneous: Note: You may only have one Oath

talents.description: You vow to flow with the song itself, drifting across where the trails may take you. If the song permeates everything, then let it be your conduit, and you its master.
talents.miscellaneous: Note: You may only have one Oath
talents.talent_stats: +1 Wildcard Mantra, +1 Mobility Mantra, +8 Passive Agility

talents.description: You vow to give up your own life for the sake of others. Stepping out of the fray, you become the foundation of your allies' strength.
talents.miscellaneous: Note: You may only have one Oath

talents.description: You vow to never be bound to any oath; to live your life free of restraint. If free will is an illusion, why not make it a convincing one?
talents.miscellaneous: Note: You may only have one Oath

talents.description: You vow to feel the knowledge of all that is, all at once. Your heart beats with the world itself, as the Stars above watch over you.
talents.miscellaneous: Note: You may only have one Oath

talents.description: You vow to only see that which you wish to see. Reality itself is malleable. Pliable to your deft hands.
talents.miscellaneous: Note: You may only have one Oath

talents.description: The mystic eye through which you now see the world can perceive the imperceptible. Invisible foes are highlighted.
You can now equip Cestus.
talents.from: Way of Navae or Legion Kata

talents.description: Gain the ability to use the Legion's martial arts.
talents.from: Talk to Amara in Lower Erisia with good Legion rep

talents.description: A chant that steers you into the state of insanity for 20 seconds.
talents.from: Go insane; talk to Kasen in the Ethironal Shrine Sanctuary

talents.description: Bombs will deal increased damage to burning enemies.
Your bombs have a chance to detonate twice.
Gain a large boost of speed after throwing a bomb.
Bombs will set your enemies on fire upon detonation, as well as launch with more force.
You have a chance to activate a bomb in your inventory when damaged.
Your cooldown for throwing bombs will be shortened after your first bomb damages on enemy.
Call upon a gust of wind to propel your boat even faster.
Drift in and out of reality, challenging those hailing from distant lands. Grants you the ability to access the PvP Arena.
Your eyes have been opened to the wasteland. You can now see through the harsh fog of the storm of the Eternal Gale more clearly now.
talents.from: Complete Firfire's Spear of Nakti Quest

talents.description: You can now make use of the Ignition Union hooks to ascend or descend.
talents.from: Talk to Alpha in the Frontier Furnace

talents.description: You gain significantly more ether from consuming elemental ingredients.
You regenerate your armor at campfires.
You can collect lumber from the trees you fell with your fists. It's only natural.
talents.from: Complete the Lumber Axe Quest in Etris

talents.description: Chance to receive two sets of ore when mining. You mine things more quickly.
talents.from: Turn in 5 Pure Ores to a Blacksmith

talents.description: Chance to receive two sets of ingredients when harvesting. You fell trees in fewer strikes.
talents.from: Complete the Potions Quest in Widow's Cave

talents.description: You can now craft bombs at a crafting bench.
talents.from: Complete the Mineskipper Quest in Songseeker Wilds

talents.description: Landing a hit with your critical restores 30% of your posture.
talents.from: Complete the Megalodaunt Quest in Towerstruck Lands

talents.description: Landing M1 attacks slightly restores your Ether.
talents.from: Complete the Megalodaunt Quest in Towerstruck Lands

talents.description: Allows you to move quickly when you dodge mid-air.
talents.from: Complete the Flame Gazer Quest in Pathfinder's Respite

talents.description: You progress much faster in the Depths, and slower on the overworld. You can regain sanity at Castle Light, but will always face the strongest foes in your Trial.
You progress much faster from completing bounties, and less from events. Gain access to the Voidheart, and factions have a negative outlook on you.
The shadows of the world have a grasp upon all its land.
Voidmother's blessing, the method to travel back to the Voidheart.
[Fist] Feinting into an uppercut blinds and dazes your opponents briefly. We're even now, right? 30s cooldown
Your Haunted Gale now procs Chilled.
Blockbreaking an enemy on fire or with a fire mantra causes them to be struck by lightning.
[Rapier] Running M1's deal increased posture damage. Upon landing your critical, your next running M1 has increased range.
[Rapier] Flourishing an enemy causes your M1's to deal additional blood loss until you take damage.
[Rapier] When your posture is about to collapse, you deal greater chip and posture damage.

mantras.description: A powerful, flinging punch that shatters the air.
Unleash a barrage of blows against your foes.
Kick off of the ground with your strength, sending you into the air.
Disguise yourself in tacet and drop kick your enemies.
Strike your shield a few times to absorb some of the posture received by your allies.
Buff those around you with extra defence.
Brace yourself against attacks and gain hyperarmour.
Rush at your enemies with your full physical force.
A vengeful rush.
An adrenaline rush of mobility.
An agile dash.
Make a cauldron appear from your memories.
Predict an opponent's attack and reflect it.
Gaze into your opponent's souls.
Opponents facing you are briefly rendered immobile.
A melee strike that removes your posture's damage on hit.
Charm those around you with your powerful voice.
Taunt those around you, causing them to be unable to jump and to take more damage. However, in their rage they do extra damage.
Take on an unimaginable disguise.
Rush down your opponent cutting them apart.
A powerful slash that chips through block and slashes through armor.
A slash which moves the user forward and dealing damage upon reaching the target.
Absorb damage then return fury upon your foes.
Unleash a powerful pressure blast from the weight of your weapon.
Slicing blades of flame.
An exertion of flames.
A legion of flames.
A bullet of flames shot through each hand.
A fiery chokehold.
Snap your fingers, shooting a projectile that blinds those who dare gaze at it.
A blast of flame.
A pyroclastic eruption.
Toss a nimble dagger.
A rising tornado of flames.
Burst forward in flames.
Strike the ground, turning it to ash.
Leap up leaving behind a burst of flames.
Undying flame.
Conjure an undying flame for the caster and their comrades to rest by.
A servant of flames.
Piercing spikes of ice.
Fire a beam of ice.
An icy chokehold.
Revolving blades of ice.
A legion of frost.
Form and toss daggers of ice at your aimed opponent.
A barrage of freezing blades.
Chains of ice.
Conjure and throw weapons of ice.
A flurry of ice spikes.
A colossal mace of ice.
Form an ice spear and lunges forward.
Send ice rippling out in a shockwave.
An arc of ice.
Skate freely on paths of ice.
Enter a state of cryostasis.
Knock your enemy skyward with a kick of crystal.
Impale your foes with a brutal crystal smash.
Swift bolts of frozen air.
Arcing blades of electricity.
An electrified chokehold.
Produce a highly potent field of electromagnetism, shocking all inside.
Fire a beam of lightning.
Slam those under you with a lightning empowered kick.
Replicated forms of yourself conjured from electricity.
A strike of thunder at your desired location.
An unrelenting kick like a clap of thunder.
Conjure weapons of thunder with your ether.
A javelin of lightning.
An arrow of lighting.
A rising tornado of thunder.
A stream of lightning.
Almost instantaneous swap of location with whoever your cursor is on.
A rush of lightning.
A lightning cloak that empowers you.
Slicing blades of wind.
Shoots out an air blast.
Slicing blades of wind.
A rush of piercing wind.
A rushing current of wind.
A strike from the heavens.
Toss a wind landmine.
Form a punch of wind in your fist and release it.
Grab your opponent and toss them with the power of gale.
Use wind to uppercut and propel yourself into the air.
A powerful wind blast.
A quick swirl of sharp winds.
A rapid delivery of consecutive attacks.
A rush of wind.
A servant of wind.
Slicing blades of dark energy.
An awful blast of dark energy.
A shadowy hand.
Chains of shadow.
Form a shockwave of darkness.
Call forth the void to track your opponents.
Conjure shadows around your enemy before warp-striking to them.
Roar a wave of shadows.
Form a Shockwave of darkness.
Hail down meteors of darkness.
Temporarily summon a shadow greatsword for a large slash.
Show your foes your strength.
Create a shadow vortex that pulls in everything in its surroundings.
Gorge on your own health for raw strength.
A rush of darkness.
Heal nearby Players at the cost of your Sanity.
Disables mantras from being used, gives 10% Monster Armour and also gain total immunity to mantras whilst inside the radius.
Fires a high pressure beam from your eyes.
Spawns an illusion of yourself that targets the closest player.
Teleport you and nearby players to an alternative dimension.
If hit during the pose, negate the attacks and teleport the user behind the attacker.
Activate while hovering over an ally to buff them, or activate while hovering over an opponent to debuff them.
If linked to an ally, this move will take ~5% of your health and then heal your ally by that times an undefined amount.
If linked to an enemy, this move will start leeching your opponent's health for a few seconds while healing you.
The user rises into the air before swooping in.
Deliver a vertical slash
Emit a spinning ring of celestial energy, trapping and shredding any who steps before its wake.
Encases the user in a durable armor.
Shoot out a laser from your eyes that explodes after a second, dealing fire and lightning damage.
Release a wave of energy around you, dealing fire and lightning damage.
Dance uncontrollably. No one can withstand the sheer groove of your spin routine.
Kick your foes at the speed of light.
Summons a black casting circle before enveloping your target in black tendrils and tearing them apart.
Makes the Hidden Tendril from 'Hidden Tendril' contract, pulling both the user and enemy closer.
A counter that leaves your opponent open
Pull enemies towards you.
Burrow underneath the ground before bursting out, knocking enemies up.
Fire corals all around you.
Channels the song through the power of the Dread Serpent.
Throw a bone REALLY hard. Sans undertale
Let loose a torrent of bullets from your shoulder mounted minigun.

weapons.miscellaneous: Swing speed lowers with different weapon types
Swing speed lowers with different weapon types
Swing speed lowers with different weapon types
Swing speed lowers with different weapon types

x5 Cloth, x5 Fiber, x1 Dark Feather, x1 Lionfish Scale

mystic.dialogue: I once performed in a circus.
I skulk in alleyways, looking for my next prize.
Light on my feet, I sting like a bee.
I am ruthless. A knife for hire.
I seek the qualities of Nimble Blade.
I fight for Maestro Evengarde Rest.
I use the song to charm others.
I seek the qualities of Leader.
I feel the pain of those around me.
I am an expert on ether.
I stand far above others, an insurmountable challenge.
I am a slayer of beasts.
I dominate the minds of others.
I seek the qualities of Human Architecture.
I am a master of creating openings.
I am a master of the spear.
I am a master of all weapons.
I fight to preserve my way.
I do not need a weapon.
I seek the qualities of Natural Armor.
I will not fall to the elements.
I feed on the soul of my enemies.
I am a master of the flame.
I burn so that I may succeed.
I seek the path of the Serpent.
My unholy blade works for no man.
My blade burns through my foes.
I believe in the men who followed Pleeksty before.
My ice protects like a flower growing thorns.
Those that step on my ice know they have made a grave error.
I would see this world freeze.
I am a Glassdancer from the Eastern Steppes.
I use the winds to enforce my will.
I am a master of the winds.
I hear a whisper in the dark.
My blade conducts the skies wrath.
I electrocute my foes from afar.
I am the one who speaks to death.
In nature, I am at home.

enchants.name: Blazing
enchants.description: On hit, set your enemy on fire per-victim cooldown of 2 seconds. Flamecharm talents can be triggered by this fire. Damage of the fire scales off of your elemental intensity.Lava Serpent will create an explosion instead of creating a fire - doesn't proc on yourself.

enchants.name: Chilling
enchants.description: After hitting a target Guns: 5, LHT: 7, MED: 4, HVY: 3 times, apply Bottom Freeze, negating all movement. If the user has Crystallization, apply an ice crystal. Per-victim cooldown of 7 seconds.

enchants.name: Deferred
enchants.description: Weapon deals 1.1x damage.Weapon deals damage over time. The victim takes 1/10 of the initial damage every 0.25s 10 times

enchants.name: Detonation
enchants.description: After hitting a target Rapier/Guns: 5, LHT: 7, MED: 4, HVY: 3 times they explode, dealing 1.15x weapon damage to them and others around beside the user.Explosion can execute.

enchants.name: Elastic
enchants.description: On proc, a pink string connecting the weapon and your target will appear, pulling the target towards you Doesn't work on bullets.

enchants.name: Gluttony
enchants.description: On hit, steal hunger and thirst from the target based on damage dealt.

enchants.name: Grim
enchants.description: After hitting the target Rapier/Guns: 5, LHT: 7, MED: 4, HVY: 3 times, Grim will proc, which is signalled by red bubbles.the target is afflicted with Grim for 4 seconds, which increases all damage taken by 1.2x, and all posture damage by 1.5x.

enchants.name: Heroism
enchants.description: When above 75% HP: gain 4% damage for every 5% HP above 75% HP. 1.20x damage at 100% HPWhen below 25% HP: gain 4% damage for every 5% HP below 25% HP. 1.20x damage at 0% HP

enchants.name: Metal
enchants.description: On hit, steal some of the target's equipment durability and add it to your own.Works on NPCs and Monsters.

enchants.name: Nemesis
enchants.description: On hit, a red eye marker is placed on the enemy. Using your critical while the marker is present teleports you to the enemy and the usual critical becomes a Katana’s.• If you do not have Ardour, the Nemesis critical is unblockable.• Nemesis Critical still trigger critical talents, for example Bear Trap and others.• The range of this is 65-70 studs

enchants.name: Obfuscation
enchants.description: Weapon gains 50% chip damage.Weapon deals less posture damage.Landing hits give a speed boost.

enchants.name: Providence Thorns
enchants.description: PVE: Parrying an attack deals damage to the attacker.PVP: Parrying 2 attacks within 3 seconds deals damage to the attacker.Deal 0.043% x Power in PVP.Deal 10% x Power in PVE.Damage capped at 500.

enchants.name: Sear
enchants.description: Apply Cauterize on hit. Cauterized targets:have increased incoming PEN, with each hit increasing the PEN bonus, up to +40%.LHT: 10, MED: 6, HVY: 4 to get to around 40% PEN, the PEN it gives also counts for mantra damage.Lose thirst equal to 20% of damage taken.

enchants.name: Solar
enchants.description: Applies a Solar Mark on flourish or most critical attacks.Solar Mark last 8s, and reduce tempo gain/ether regeneration.Venting steals a portion of marked enemies tempo.

enchants.name: Stone
enchants.description: Posture damage is increased. Scales off weapon damage.Deal bonus damage on a posture break.Scales inversely with weapon damage, from 2x to 1.25x.

enchants.name: Storm
enchants.description: On proc, stun with a short cooldown, visualized by a purple lightning after-shock. Boosts damage by 10% in the rain.In the rain, M1 connections will also summon a bolt of lightning on the opponent, increasing damage by 10%.

enchants.name: Stormbreaker
enchants.description: Effects of the storm enchant with a unique critical that throws your weapon towards your cursor, ragdolling and striking targets with thunder. You are unable to attack until your weapon returns You may however parry.

enchants.name: Tears of Edenkite
enchants.description: On flourish, create bubbles around you that home onto an enemy, dealing damage and stunning.

enchants.name: Umbral Knight
enchants.description: On hit, a red slash will follow up after a successful m1 on the target, before it goes on a short cooldown.The slash of Umbral Knight deals 20% damage of the weapon and is parryable.Hitting an entity with hyperarmor e.g Brace, Monsters causes the slash to damage both parties.

enchants.name: Vampirism
enchants.description: Heal for 15% of damage dealt. Heals blood bar. Heals less when proc on Primadon and Scion of Ethiron. Heals significantly less when proc on Chaser.

enchants.name: Wild
enchants.description: On hit, deal 25% of the weapon damage in an AOE. Does not hit the victim or allies.M1s to allies deals 50% damage.

enchants.name: Curse of the Bloodthirsty
enchants.description: Weapon gain 1.1x damage.Blood damage is increased.While above 10% HP, missing an M1 deal 1% of max HP as self damage.

enchants.name: Curse of the No Life King
enchants.description: While held, gain passive health regen. Every M1 gives 2% insanity.Permanently stained health bar while the weapon is equipped. If you dequip the weapon, then your bar should become unstained2x blood damage taken in the Etrean Luminant.When equipped, -100 sanity. This means you will immediately die upon equipping the curse in the Depths. unless you have a high amount of willpowerDisabled in ArenaViscosity is disabled

enchants.name: Curse of the Unbidden
enchants.description: On hit, a purple portal appears while this is active it drains ether and the person you hit has reduced damage. Your critical is changed to a counter. When the counter procs, you will take no damage and your opponent does less damage to you for an unspecified amount of time. Succesfully Countering ? Times will cause your critical to be changed to a stronger variant that applies knockdown.

enchants.name: Curse of Yun'Shul
enchants.description: On proc, 5% of your max health adds to your damage.Deal bonus damage in PVE.Rarely, take self damage equal to 10% of own HP.Has a 10 second cooldown.

enchants.name: Adhesive
enchants.description: On proc, pull the attacker toward you.

enchants.name: Allure
enchants.description: On proc, apply Charm on the enemy. All charm related talent that the user have are applied.

enchants.name: Bounce
enchants.description: Chance of 20% to push the attacker away, making it harder to chain attacks.

enchants.name: Displacement
enchants.description: On proc, grant a speed boost and hyperarmor.

enchants.name: Drowned
enchants.description: Drowned equipments grant, on top of their innate stats and talents:10 Health10 Ether5% Monster Damage5% Monster ArmorThese stats do not consume stat rolls for equipment.

enchants.name: Entanglement
enchants.description: On proc, greatly slows the user and reduce damage taken by the attack and the next 5 attacks by 10%.

enchants.name: Ferocity
enchants.description: On proc, gain a speed boost and damage reduction based on how much tempo you have.

enchants.name: Multiplicity
enchants.description: On proc, recover hunger, thirst or blood. Also can negate and heal damage or give damage reduction on proc.

enchants.name: Stench
enchants.description: On proc, release a cloud of gas that deals damage to nearby enemies who stand in it.

enchants.name: Viscocity
enchants.description: Incoming damage is instead applied over 2.5 seconds. User takes 1/10 of the initial incoming damage every 0.25s 10 times.The user cannot be knocked or executed unless they are hit while at 1% HP.Disabled if using Curse of the No Life King. Disables Poser's Ring's effect on user. Disabled in Arena
